short_summary: F6855-220010 - RISO - Hydraulic Supply and Services - DFO and CCG Atlantic vessels. This is a standing offer for hydraulic supply and services to various DFO/CCG vessels. The offer is open to all qualified suppliers.
description: F6855-220010 - RISO - Hydraulic Supply and Services - DFO and CCG Atlantic vessels
full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement

**Tender Title:** F6855-220010 - Regional Individual Standing Offer (RISO) for Hydraulic Supply and Services

**Solicitation Number:** WS4058543597

**Tender Status:** Expired

## Project Overview

The Canadian Coast Guard is seeking a contractor to establish a Regional Individual Standing Offer (RISO) for the provision of hydraulic supply and services to its vessels in the Atlantic region.

## Service Requirements

The successful contractor will be required to provide skilled labor, parts, materials, and equipment for:

* Troubleshooting and testing of hydraulic systems
* Repairs and calibrations of hydraulic equipment and components
* Inspections and maintenance of hydraulic systems and equipment
* Other related services

## Key Details

* **Publication Date:** July 11, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date:** August 3, 2023, at 2:00 PM EST
* **Expected Contract Start Date:** August 31, 2023
* **Regions of Delivery:** Nova Scotia, New Brunswick, Prince Edward Island, and Newfoundland and Labrador
* **End-User Entities:** Department of Fisheries and Oceans (DFO) and Canadian Coast Guard (CCG)

## Contracting Entity Information

* **Contracting Entity Name:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **Contracting Entity Address:** 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec K1A 0S5, Canada

## Contact Information

* **Contact Name:** Jonathan Grant (SPAC/PSPC)
* **Contact Email:** jonathan.grant@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
* **Notice URL:** http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16837841?extsite=MTY4Mzc4NDFfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==
